section.p: Dialog Nibelung StudDB presents two different views of the data: tree view (_fixme [xref]) in the left panel and table view in the right one. Table view allows simultaneous display of a large number of database records, search them, sort, and filter. Keyboard hotkeys (_fixme_[xref]) and context menus (_fixme_ [xref]) are both available in the table view for quick access to the individual student profiles.
